articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A52 5G full unboxing video posted ahead of launch - HT Tech

articles.content: The Galaxy A52 5G is expected to launch alongside the Galaxy A72 on March 17 at Samsungs second Unpacked event of the year. The Galaxy A52 5G has already been spotted multiple times, and now an unbox… [+1254 chars]
